price: Na wakasema: Msiwaache miungu yenu, wala msimwache Wadda wala Suwaa' wala Yaghutha, wala Yau'qa, wala Nasra.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدّٗا وَلَا سُوَاعٗا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرٗا
footnotes: Na wao wakiwaambia: Msiache kuiabudu miungu yenu, wala msimwache Wadda, wala Suwaa' , wala Yaghutha, wala Yau'qa, wala Nasra. Na hawa walikuwa miungu ya masanamu iliyo chongwa kwa sura ya wanyama namna mbali mbali.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqālū lā tadharunna ālihatakum walā tadharunna waddan walā suwāʿan walā yaghūtha wayaʿūqa wanasran
